my servants. These servants are those who serve and worship God—as opposed to those who serve and worship idols—or those who, in apathy or lack of conviction, do neither.

eat/drink/rejoice/hungry/thirsty/ashamed. Those who eat, drink, and are merry in this life will eventually receive a reversal of their conditions, while those who cling to the Lord despite temporal privation will be rewarded with eternal rejoicing. These blessings and cursings also have a spiritual application, referring to the bread and waters of life.
